title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When I preview the report and click the 'Show Report Parameters' button
EB: I expected to see the default values displayed in the value box, so that I can easily modify the parameter I want to change.
SR:
To reproduce the bug: 
1. Run the report and preview it.
2. Click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
Expected result: The default values for each parameter should be shown in their respective value boxes.
Actual result: In the 'Enter Parameters' dialog, all the parameter values are empty, requiring me to input all the values again.
